name: Callout
description: Content component for highlighting important information with title, content and links. Provides a prominent way to draw attention to key messages or call-to-action content.

links.description: Array of link objects for call-to-action buttons or links.

is_new_window.description: Whether to open link in new window

content_top.description: Additional content area above main content.

content_bottom.description: Additional content area below main content.

examples.name: Basic Callout
examples.description: Simple callout with title and content

props.title: Important Notice
props.content: This is an important message that needs to stand out from the rest of the content.

props.title: Get Started Today
props.content: Join thousands of users who are already benefiting from our service.

props.title: Special Offer
props.content: Limited time offer - don't miss out on this exclusive opportunity.

when_to_use: Draw attention to special offers or promotions
Provide secondary navigation or next steps
when_not_to_use: For general content - use regular text components
As primary navigation - use navigation components
For complex forms or interactions - use specialized components
When the content doesn't need special emphasis
best_practices: Use clear, concise titles that grab attention
Limit the number of links to avoid decision paralysis
Use appropriate vertical spacing to separate from other content
Use consistently throughout the site for similar types of content

accessibility.notes: Component provides proper semantic markup for highlighted content with accessible link structures.

variations: Content types: Text-only, with links, with multiple content areas
Spacing: Top, bottom, or both vertical spacing options
Theme variations: Light and dark theme support
Link types: Internal and external links with various behaviors
Content slots: Flexible content areas for different use cases

findings: Users respond well to visually distinct callout sections
Clear call-to-action buttons improve conversion rates
Too many links in callouts can reduce effectiveness
Consistent styling helps users recognize important information
